column2: "Yeah, that's it! That's the rod I was looking for! Thank you so much!"
"Zeno gave me this when I first got into ARKS."

"I've used it ever since, so it has a lot of sentimental value...
Ah, I'm so glad to have it back..."
"Thanks again! Here's your reward. Please, take it. It was a Client Order, after all."
"Oh, this is a good time to give you my partner card, isn't it. Call me any time!"

"
You can now call Echo as a partner.
"
